channel.title: Airflow on Shadowsong's Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in Airflow on Shadowsong's Personal Website

item.title: DE Log 7: Migrating from Airflow 1 to 2
item.description: Today I have successfully migrated my current Airflow setup from v1.10.14 to v2.0.2. This article will not be a very detailed step by step guide for upgrading, instead I will introduce the general migration step worked very specifically for my setup, and share some of the problems I encountered during the process, and finally some general feelings with Airflow 2.

item.title: DE Log 0.1: Rescheduling of Airflow DAGs
item.description: This article briefly records the step to reschedule a DAG on Apache Airflow
